sentences.en: Clues and leads were being followed up from Albany to Oakland.
sentences.cn: 从奥尔巴尼到奥克兰的一切线索和疑点都在追查之中.

sentences.en: How much is it as far as Oakland?
sentences.cn: 到奥克兰的票要多少钱?

sentences.en: I met with Sculley in a hotel lobby near Oakland airport. Sculley had been taking meetings for his investment fund and was waiting for a flight back home on the east coast.
sentences.cn: 我是在奥克兰机场附近的酒店大厅里遇见的斯卡利，他刚刚参加完自己投资基金的一个会议，在机场附近等候航班回东海岸的家。

sentences.en: I thought this building should be physically and symbolically connected with the city as a powerful social and cultural resource for Oakland.
sentences.cn: 我认为，这座建筑应该作为奥克兰一个强大的社会与文化资源，在外形和寓意上都与这座城市彼此相联。

sentences.en: I was in Oakland last week for work.
sentences.cn: 我上星期为工作在奥克兰.

sentences.en: It began Friday in Oakland and got off to a good start.
sentences.cn: 就从周五的奥克兰城开始,书写辉煌的新一页.

sentences.en: Los Angeles , Santa Monica , Oakland and, naturally, Berkeley are exploring similar moves.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶 、 圣莫尼卡 、 自然还有伯克莱, 正在类似的举措上探索.

sentences.en: Now living in Oakland, they own three wine stores and have a baby boy.
sentences.cn: 现在他们住在奥克兰，拥有三家葡萄酒商店，生了一个男孩。

sentences.en: Now we're on the Bayshore Freeway to Oakland.
sentences.cn: 现在我们上了海湾高速公路去欧克兰.

sentences.en: OAKLAND , CALIF . - The new, high - scoring, rapid - firing Rockets might have seemed beaten.
sentences.cn: 这支崭新, 高得分, 火力密集的火箭队看起来要被打败了.

sentences.en: Oakland fears that rising seas will salinate its underground aquifer.
sentences.cn: 奥克兰则担忧,上升的海平面会导致地下蓄水层盐化.

sentences.en: Oakland, California, opened an International High School international high school last year.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州的奥克兰去年开办了一所国际高中.

sentences.en: Oakland, California, opened the an international high school last year.
sentences.cn: 奥克兰 、 加利福尼亚在去年也成立了一所国际中学.

sentences.en: The train left Oakland station at six o'clock.
sentences.cn: 晚上六点钟,火车载着旅客从奥克兰出发.

sentences.en: The winner will face the Oakland A's in the playoffs this weekend.
sentences.cn: 获胜者将在本周末的季后赛中对阵奥克兰运动者队。
难道这儿不是加利福尼亚州的奥克兰 吗 ?

sentences.en: Who would be interested: Anaheim , Oakland or Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 谁有兴趣: 现在天使、动家以及双城可能对他有兴趣.

sentences.en: Yeah, Bay Area rocks and Oakland shakes!
sentences.cn: 是的, 海湾区域岩石和奥克兰摇动!

trans.tran_cn: 奥克兰(美国加利福尼亚州西部城市)
奥克兰（美国加利福尼亚州西部港市）
